p: The methanolic extract gathered from the floral budding stage had the highest amount of phenolic acids (287.6 mg/g dried extract) following by early seed development (259.7 mg/g dried extract), full flowering stage (153.9 mg/g dried extract), vegetative stage (72.5 dried mg/g extract), and mid‐mature seed stage (46.2 mg/g dried extract). On the other hand, the mature seed extract contained the minimum amount of phenolic acids (24.8 mg/g dried extract) (Table 2).
